turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Supreme Court of Puerto Rico.
turn.1: How many women have served on the Supreme Court of Puerto Rico?
turn.2: With the arrival of Associate Justice Oronoz, the four female justices constitute the largest number of women in history to serve on the Court simultaneously.
turn.3: What are the current associate justices?
turn.4: Of the eight current Associate Justices, five have served on the Puerto Rico Court of Appeals.
turn.5: What other positions did the justices hold?
turn.6: Justice Anabelle Rodríguez served as Solicitor General and Attorney General of Puerto Rico, Justice Kolthoff served as a Superior Court Judge and Justice Estrella served as legal advisor to the president of the Puerto Rico Senate.

turn.8: The realignment on the court has led to several significant court decisions.
turn.9: Did they overturn any previous decisions?
turn.10: In "Suarez Caceres vs CEE", the court overruled a previous court decision that required that a "None of the Above" option be included in political status plebiscites.
turn.11: Why did they argue against the "None of the Above" option?
turn.12: That option obtained an absolute majority of votes in the 1998 political status plebiscite.
